justification: The Offering ('The Ring is trying to get back to its master') and Interfaces ('The pirate captain wore a tricorn hat and an eye patch') provide no evidence of interactive, computer-generated enhancements to a real-world environment or immersive user experiences as described in the Ability. There is no mention of augmented reality, interactivity, or simulation.
ability: The ability to provide an interactive experience of a real-world environment where the objects that reside in the real world are enhanced by computer-generated perceptual information such as visual, auditory, haptic etc.  environment.
